start.text: Crack... crack... The egg begins to move! Something is stirring inside...

hatch.speaker: Baby Dragon
hatch.text: Chirp! A tiny dragon head pokes through the shell, blinking at you curiously.

name_prompt.speaker: Narrator
name_prompt.text: The little dragon seems to be waiting for something. Perhaps you should give it a name?

after_name.speaker: Baby Dragon
after_name.text: The dragon chirps happily at its new name! It seems to understand you already.

tutorial_start.speaker: Narrator
tutorial_start.text: Welcome to Dragon Haven Cafe! You've inherited this cozy establishment along with a very special companion.

choices.text: Tell me more about the cafe

cafe_info.speaker: Narrator
cafe_info.text: The cafe serves magical dishes that can influence your dragon's color and abilities. Gather ingredients, cook recipes, and serve customers to build your reputation!

dragon_info.speaker: Narrator
dragon_info.text: Your dragon will grow through stages: Egg, Hatchling, and Juvenile. Feed it well, keep it happy, and your bond will strengthen. The food you serve affects its color!

end_intro.speaker: Narrator
end_intro.text: Good luck with your cafe! Remember: a happy dragon makes for a prosperous business.
